title: GENIUS Act Establishes Federal Framework for Stablecoins Alongside Bitcoin ETF and FASB Rules
summary: The GENIUS Act creates the first federal framework for U.S. stablecoins, completing a regulatory trifecta with SEC's Bitcoin ETF approval and FASB's fair-value crypto accounting rules. This legislation legitimizes dollar-backed tokens and enables regulated entities to issue digital dollars at scale, with stablecoin issuance notably increasing since November 2024.
